queryMap.query: SELECT /* rsm3150_s01 */ R.MEET_CD, R.STND_YEAR, R.TMS, R.DAY_ORD, R.RACE_NO, R.TMS||'회 '||R.DAY_ORD||'일차 '||R.RACE_NO||'경주' INFO, -- 경주 CASE WHEN R.POOL_CD='001' THEN '단승식' WHEN R.POOL_CD='002' THEN '연승식' WHEN R.POOL_CD='005' THEN '복승식' WHEN R.POOL_CD='004' THEN '쌍승식' WHEN R.POOL_CD='006' THEN '삼복승식' END POOL_NM, -- 승식 R.PAYOFF, -- 배당률 --TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(I.RACE_DAY,'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') RACE_DAY, I.RACE_DAY, -- 일자 CASE WHEN R.POOL_CD='001' THEN R.RUNNER_1ST WHEN R.POOL_CD='002' THEN R.RUNNER_1ST WHEN R.POOL_CD='005' THEN R.RUNNER_1ST||'/'||R.RUNNER_2ND WHEN R.POOL_CD='004' THEN R.RUNNER_1ST||'/'||R.RUNNER_2ND WHEN R.POOL_CD='006' THEN R.RUNNER_1ST||'/'||R.RUNNER_2ND||'/'||RUNNER_3RD END RUNNER -- 승자번호 FROM TBES_SDL_RS R, VW_SDL_INFO I WHERE 1=1 AND R.MEET_CD = ? -- 0:MEET_CD -- 개최지 코드 AND R.STND_YEAR = ? -- 1:STND_YEAR -- 기준년도 AND R.PAYOFF >= ? -- 2:PAYOFF -- 옵션 배율 AND I.MEET_CD = ? -- 3:MEET_CD -- 개최지 코드 AND I.STND_YEAR = ? -- 4:STND_YEAR -- 기준년도 AND I.MEET_CD=R.MEET_CD -- AND I.RACE_DAY LIKE :STND_YEAR||'%' AND SUBSTR(I.RACE_DAY,0,4) = ? -- 5:STND_YEAR -- 기준년도 AND I.STND_YEAR=R.STND_YEAR AND I.TMS=R.TMS AND I.DAY_ORD=R.DAY_ORD ORDER BY I.RACE_DAY
